images.copyright: Octopus spotted during a night dive near Kona, Hawaii, USA (© Jeff Milisen/Alamy)
images.title: Let’s celebrate cephalopods
images.caption: Let’s celebrate cephalopods
images.desc: For World Octopus Day, we’re lighting up your screen with a shot of a nocturnal octopus from the genus Callistoctopus in its larval stage. It was photographed on a night dive near the Big Island of Hawaii. You may not think octopuses are cute and cuddly, but they are charismatic characters. The highly intelligent species has been observed solving puzzles, unscrewing lids, and even using tools.
